text:
I found nothing about this problem in Apache bugzilla.

When I do :
./configure --help
i can not see the option :
--enable-nonportable-atomics

In Apache 2.2 documentation, this option is available :
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/misc/perf-tuning.html

I found nothing about that this option was removed in
http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/CHANGES_2.0
or
http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/CHANGES_2.2

Please can you add --enable-nonportable-atomics as option
in configure file when I do ./configure --help or
if this option is not available now, please add this change
in the apache 2.2.x changes or changelog file. 

Environment :
Apache 2.2.10
Redhat Linux ES4.0
GNU Make 3.80
autoconf (GNU Autoconf) 2.59
automake (GNU automake) 1.9.2

text: Other information, when I do configure with --enable-nonportable-atomics=yes with Apache 2.2.10, I have no error. Configure work well and I can compile

text:
This is an APR option and thus not displayed by httpd's configure script. You can see this option by

cd srclib/apr
./configure --help
